Explore our comprehensive range of tech courses designed to transform your career

Language: English
Mobile App Development Specialization
Software Testing & Quality Assurance Specialization
Data Analysis & Office Productivity
3levels:Learn essential tools (Word, Excel, PowerPoint) to handle daily business tasks. Build on basics to analyze and visualize data with advanced Excel techniques. Apply data analysis insights to solve complex business problems.
Data Analysis with ExcelBuild on basics to analyze and visualize data with advanced Excel techniques.
4 Months
Level 2
Learn more
Data Science, Machine Learning & AI Specialization
3 levels: Cover Python basics, data entry, and elementary data manipulation. Implement data visualization (using Excel, Power BI, or Tableau) and basic ML models. Explore neural networks, NLP, computer vision, and scalable AI solutions.
Introduction to Data Science & MLCover Python basics, data entry, and elementary data manipulation.
4 Months
Level 1
Learn more
Digital Marketing Specialization
3 levels: Learn SEO, social media marketing, and the basics of paid advertising. Develop engaging content and optimize digital campaigns. Master data‑driven marketing optimization and advanced campaign strategies.
Content & Social Media StrategiesDevelop engaging content and optimize digital campaigns.
4 Months
Level 2
Learn more
Foundations of Programming Specialization
3 levels: Learn Python basics and solve introductory coding challenges. Build on basics to write practical programs and scripts. Explore advanced features, libraries, and application development with Python.
Advanced Python Programming for ApplicationsExplore advanced features, libraries, and application development with Python.
4 Months
Level 3
Learn more
Game Development Specialization
3 levels: Learn game design fundamentals through visual programming (drag‑and‑drop). Develop interactive games using JavaScript and Processing libraries. Master complex game physics, multiplayer design, and integrate emerging tech (e.g., VR).
Advanced Game DevelopmentMaster complex game physics, multiplayer design, and integrate emerging tech (e.g., VR).
4 Months
Level 3
Learn more
Graphic Design & Creative Arts Specialization
3 Levels: Introduction to Canva, Adobe Photoshop, and Illustrator basics. Learn wireframing, prototyping (Adobe XD, Figma), and advanced design techniques. Focus on high‑fidelity designs, animations, and building a professional portfolio.
UI/UX & Visual CommunicationLearn wireframing, prototyping (Adobe XD, Figma), and advanced design techniques.
4 Months
Level 2
Learn more
Language: Arabic
3 levels: Basic vocabulary, simple grammar, and foundational script reading. Expanded vocabulary, complex sentences, and improved listening and speaking skills. Refines fluency, advanced grammar, and idiomatic expressions, with a focus on cultural context.
Intermediate(Arabic)Expanded vocabulary, complex sentences, and improved listening and speaking skills.
4 Months
Level 2
Learn more
Language: Japanese
3 levels: Basic vocabulary, simple grammar, and foundational kanji and kana reading. Expanded vocabulary, complex sentences, and improved listening and speaking skills. Refines fluency, advanced grammar, and idiomatic expressions, with a focus on cultural context.
Intermediate(Japanese)Expands vocabulary, complex sentences, and improves listening and speaking.
4 Months
Level 2
Learn more
Programming & Backend Development Specialization
3 levels:Learn coding fundamentals and pr Develop server‑side systems, RESTful APIs, and data management techniques. Build scalable backend applications with advanced frameworks and best practices.
Python for Backend DevelopmentDevelop server‑side systems, RESTful APIs, and data management techniques.
4 Months
Level 2
Learn more
Web Development Specialization
3levels:Cover HTML, CSS, and basic JavaScript to create and style web pages. Develop dynamic interfaces using modern frameworks (React/Vue/Angular) and CMS basics. Learn responsive design, static site generation, and integrate cloud services (e.g., Firebase).
Foundations of Web DevelopmentCover HTML, CSS, and basic JavaScript to create and style web pages.
4 Months
Level 1
Learn more
AI & Robotics Specialization
3 levels: Cover AI fundamentals and an overview of robotics concepts. Learn hardware basics, sensor integration, and an introduction to ROS Focus on machine learning for robotics and human‑robot interaction design.
Coming Soon
AR/VR Development Specialization
3 levels :Learn the fundamentals and history of augmented and virtual reality. Explore tools and platforms to create immersive experiences. Delve into real‑time rendering, 3D modeling, and interactive design techniques.
Coming Soon
Blockchain Technology Specialization
3 levels:Understand distributed ledger concepts and basic blockchain principles. Dive into smart contracts and decentralized application development. Focus on scalable blockchain solutions and advanced cryptographic techniques.
Coming Soon
Business & Project Management Specialization
3 levels: Cover planning, scheduling, and resource allocation basics. Learn process mapping, requirements gathering, and operational analysis. Master leadership, risk management, and advanced methodologies.
Coming Soon
Cybersecurity Specialization
3 levels: Cover fundamentals, IT basics, and overall cybersecurity awareness. Dive into network vulnerabilities, penetration testing, and defensive strategies. Master sophisticated offensive/defensive techniques, secure coding, and incident management.
Coming Soon
Data Engineering Specialization
3 levels: Understand data storage fundamentals, relational databases, and basic SQL queries. Learn to build and manage data pipelines and extract-transform-load processes. Explore big data tools (Spark, Kafka) and scalable data processing architectures.
Coming Soon
DevOps, Cloud Computing & Software Development Specialization
3 levels: Introduction to cloud environments, Linux server management, and basic DevOps tools. Learn automation pipelines, containerization, and version control. Focus on scalable architectures, Kubernetes, and advanced QA & automation strategies.
Coming Soon
Freelancing & Productivity Specialization
3 levels: Set up profiles and learn how to navigate freelancing platforms. Boost productivity using advanced features in Word, Excel, and PowerPoint. Optimize proposals, build a personal brand, and manage freelance projects.
Coming Soon
Internet of Things (IoT) & Embedded Systems Specialization
3 levels:Learn the basics of connected devices and sensor technologies. Explore device communication, protocols, and IoT architecture. Study real‑time processing, sensor integration, and security for embedded systems.
Coming Soon
IQ:
This IQ test is required for all courses needing IQ assessment
Coming Soon
Language: English
3 levels : Basic vocabulary and simple grammar to build foundational skills. Expands vocabulary, complex sentences, and improves listening and speaking. Refines fluency, advanced grammar, and idiomatic expressions.
Coming Soon
Mobile App Development Specialization
3 levels: Learn mobile app logic and design using beginner-friendly tools (e.g., MIT App Inventor). Develop apps using modern frameworks like React Native or Flutter. Focus on performance optimization, native modules, push notifications, and CI/CD integration.
Coming Soon
Software Testing & Quality Assurance Specialization
3 levels :Learn basic testing methodologies, tools, and best practices. Develop hands‑on skills in both manual testing and introductory automated testing frameworks. Master advanced test automation, continuous integration testing, and quality assurance leadership.
Coming Soon

Available Now
